TEXT.English: One of Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear.
TEXT.French: One of Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear.
TEXT.German: One of Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear.
TEXT.Italian: One of Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear.
TEXT.Spanish: One of Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear.

TEXT.English: One of our Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear. We have to do something or our system may turn into a black hole!
TEXT.French: One of our Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear. We have to do something or our system may turn into a black hole!
TEXT.German: One of our Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear. We have to do something or our system may turn into a black hole!
TEXT.Italian: One of our Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear. We have to do something or our system may turn into a black hole!
TEXT.Spanish: One of our Universal Recyclers has caused a black hole to appear. We have to do something or our system may turn into a black hole!

TEXT.English: Routing agencies discourage traveling near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city due to increased radiation levels.
TEXT.French: Routing agencies discourage traveling near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city due to increased radiation levels.
TEXT.German: Routing agencies discourage traveling near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city due to increased radiation levels.
TEXT.Italian: Routing agencies discourage traveling near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city due to increased radiation levels.
TEXT.Spanish: Routing agencies discourage traveling near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city due to increased radiation levels.

TEXT.English: Our scientists have detected that radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have increased.
TEXT.French: Our scientists have detected that radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have increased.
TEXT.German: Our scientists have detected that radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have increased.
TEXT.Italian: Our scientists have detected that radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have increased.
TEXT.Spanish: Our scientists have detected that radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have increased.

TEXT.English: Hope no one gets trapped in it.
TEXT.French: Hope no one gets trapped in it.
TEXT.German: Hope no one gets trapped in it.
TEXT.Italian: Hope no one gets trapped in it.
TEXT.Spanish: Hope no one gets trapped in it.

TEXT.English: Travel agent's offices advertise traveling to a new volume of space with low radiation near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Travel agent's offices advertise traveling to a new volume of space with low radiation near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Travel agent's offices advertise traveling to a new volume of space with low radiation near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: Travel agent's offices advertise traveling to a new volume of space with low radiation near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Travel agent's offices advertise traveling to a new volume of space with low radiation near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have decreased significantly.
TEXT.French: Radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have decreased significantly.
TEXT.German: Radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have decreased significantly.
TEXT.Italian: Radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have decreased significantly.
TEXT.Spanish: Radiation levels near the city of %s2_city have decreased significantly.

TEXT.English: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.French: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.German: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.Italian: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.Spanish: Now space here is a safer place.

TEXT.English: Geomagnetic storm paralyses the %s1_civ_adjective star system of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Geomagnetic storm paralyses the %s1_civ_adjective star system of %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Geomagnetic storm paralyses the %s1_civ_adjective star system of %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: Geomagnetic storm paralyses the %s1_civ_adjective star system of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Geomagnetic storm paralyses the %s1_civ_adjective star system of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Radiation levels in the solar system of %s2_city have have significantly, paralysing all unshielded traffic and destroying unshielded electronics.
TEXT.French: Radiation levels in the solar system of %s2_city have have significantly, paralysing all unshielded traffic and destroying unshielded electronics.
TEXT.German: Radiation levels in the solar system of %s2_city have have significantly, paralysing all unshielded traffic and destroying unshielded electronics.
TEXT.Italian: Radiation levels in the solar system of %s2_city have have significantly, paralysing all unshielded traffic and destroying unshielded electronics.
TEXT.Spanish: Radiation levels in the solar system of %s2_city have have significantly, paralysing all unshielded traffic and destroying unshielded electronics.

TEXT.English: We can't do anything about this. Advise turning on all available shields.
TEXT.French: We can't do anything about this. Advise turning on all available shields.
TEXT.German: We can't do anything about this. Advise turning on all available shields.
TEXT.Italian: We can't do anything about this. Advise turning on all available shields.
TEXT.Spanish: We can't do anything about this. Advise turning on all available shields.

TEXT.English: Send in some ships to help the system.
TEXT.French: Send in some ships to help the system.
TEXT.German: Send in some ships to help the system.
TEXT.Italian: Send in some ships to help the system.
TEXT.Spanish: Send in some ships to help the system.

TEXT.English: Try shielding only necessary ships and electronical devices, we can't protect everyone.
TEXT.French: Try shielding only necessary ships and electronical devices, we can't protect everyone.
TEXT.German: Try shielding only necessary ships and electronical devices, we can't protect everyone.
TEXT.Italian: Try shielding only necessary ships and electronical devices, we can't protect everyone.
TEXT.Spanish: Try shielding only necessary ships and electronical devices, we can't protect everyone.

TEXT.English: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.French: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.German: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.Italian: Now space here is a safer place.
TEXT.Spanish: Now space here is a safer place.

TEXT.English: Fund mass production and deployment of shields so as to protect everything that needs protection.
TEXT.French: Fund mass production and deployment of shields so as to protect everything that needs protection.
TEXT.German: Fund mass production and deployment of shields so as to protect everything that needs protection.
TEXT.Italian: Fund mass production and deployment of shields so as to protect everything that needs protection.
